title: powers conferred on me by section 81 of the Finance Act 2015 (No. 52 of 2015)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Disabled Drivers and Disabled
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Disabled Drivers and Disabled 

Passengers Fuel Grant (Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited disabled driver disabled passenger fuel grant (amendment) regulation 2021

title: powers conferred on me by section 81 of the Finance Act 2015 (No. 52 of 2015)
heading: 2. The Disabled Drivers and Disabled Passengers Fuel Grant Regulations
text_raw:
2. The Disabled Drivers and Disabled Passengers Fuel Grant Regulations 

(S.I. No. 635 of 2015) are amended - 

(a) 

in Regulation 5(1) – 

(i) 

in subparagraph (b), by the substitution of “Schedule 2,” for 
“Schedule 2, and”, 

(ii) by the substitution of the following subparagraph for 

subparagraph (c): 

in the case of hydrocarbon oil purchased on or after 1 
January 2021 and before 1 January 2022, in Schedule 
3,”, 

“(c) 

and 

(iii) by the insertion of the following subparagraphs after 

subparagraph (c): 

“(d) in the case of hydrocarbon oil purchased on or after 1 
January 2022 and before 1 May 2022, in Schedule 4, 
and, 

(e) 

in the case of hydrocarbon oil purchased on or after 1 
May 2022, in Schedule 5.”, 

and 

(b) by the substitution of the following Schedules for Schedules 1, 2 

and 3: 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [775] 3 

Regulation 5(1)(a) 

“SCHEDULE 1 

Rates of fuel grant payable by type of hydrocarbon oil purchased on or before 
31 December 2019 

Fuel Type 

Petrol 

Heavy oil 

Liquefied petroleum gas 

Rate per litre 

€0.59 

€0.48 

€0.10 

 
 
 
 
 4 [775] 

Regulation 5(1)(b)
